ARABIC: أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ أَلِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Worship none but Allah. I fear for you the punishment of a painful day.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not worship anyone but God; for I fear the punishment of a dreadful day for you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that you may worship none but Allah or else I fear for you the chastisement of a Grievous Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: that they should not worship anyone besides God. (Noah warned them), "I am afraid that you will suffer the most painful torment".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “That you must worship none except Allah; indeed I fear the punishment of the calamitous day upon you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That you worship none but Allah; surely, I fear for you the torment of a painful Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That you shall not serve any but Allah, surely I fear for you the punishment of a painful day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Serve you none but God. I fear for you the chastisement of a painful day.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That ye serve none, save Allah. Lo! I fear for you the retribution of a painful Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: worship none but God. I fear lest punishment befall you on a woeful Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That ye shall worship none except Allah; verily I fear for you the torment of a Day afflictive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Worship none but Allah. Indeed I fear for you the punishment of a painful day.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That ye serve none but Allah: Verily I do fear for you the penalty of a grievous day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That you worship none but Allah, surely, I fear for you the torment of a painful Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Worship none except Allah. I fear for you the punishment of a painful Day'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “That you shall worship none but God. I fear for you the agony of a painful Day.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That you not worship except Allah. Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a painful day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:26] That, you worship none but God. Lo! I fear for you, should you worship other than Him, the chastisement of a painful day’, painful in this world and in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That ye serve none) you confess the divine Oneness of none, (save Allah. Lo! I fear for you) I know that there shall come upon you if you do not believe (the retribution of a painful Day) which is drowning.
